title: World Missions
body: Does anyone know if the missions stopped, cause it is already been a week since the first time they came out and yet no new missions have been added. Thank you.

replies.body: Week 2 missions are aiming to activate on October 2nd, around noon.
they will start coming in 2 oct
but that means that we went 1 week without missions. As one who bought the extra missions pass, i don't want to think Riot would do this.
